dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4239074H] COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2007 10:06 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4239074H] COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE Added by system at Wednesday, May 23 2007 03:01 pm X-MailFrom: barbara.steinberg@sulake.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed May 23 15:00:44 2007 Received: (qmail 32428 invoked by alias); 23 May 2007 20:00:44 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 32425 invoked from network); 23 May 2007 20:00:44 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 23 May 2007 20:00:44 -0000 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 23 May 2007 15:00:44 -0500 Received: from [172.16.220.10] (helo=DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) by spooling.theplanet.com (envelope-from barbara.steinberg@sulake.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Hqwzf-000321-Ur for abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net; Wed, 23 May 2007 14:59:35 -0500 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.110]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 23 May 2007 14:59:25 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 23 May 2007 14:59:25 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from barbara.steinberg@sulake.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HqwzU-0002hS-Us for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 23 May 2007 14:59:24 -0500 Received: from punk.sulake.com ([193.64.35.198] helo=mail.sulake.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from barbara.steinberg@sulake.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HqwzJ-0001g6-Ca for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 23 May 2007 14:59:13 -0500 Received: from localhost (mail.sulake.com [193.64.35.194]) by mail.sulake.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 8312B3FC03; Wed, 23 May 2007 22:59:09 +0300 (EEST) Received: from mail.sulake.com ([193.64.35.195]) by localhost (punk [193.64.35.195]) (amavisd-new, port 10024) with ESMTP id 25389-01; Wed, 23 May 2007 22:59:08 +0300 (EEST) Received: from barbara (host-64-139-235-32.nctv.com [64.139.235.32]) (using TLSv1 with cipher RC4-MD5 (128/128 bits)) (No client certificate requested) by mail.sulake.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id F21E03FBD3; Wed, 23 May 2007 22:59:07 +0300 (EEST) Message-ID: <00b801c79d74$a3ba2100$0201a8c0@barbara> From: "Barbara Steinberg" To: , Subject: COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE Date: Wed, 23 May 2007 15:57:46 -0400 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_00B5_01C79D53.1B2F9CA0" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2800.1409 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1409 X-Virus-Scanned: amavisd-new at sulake.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 23 May 2007 19:59:25.0243 (UTC) FILETIME=[DCF920B0:01C79D74] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sir/Madam, Whois and Network inquiries listed your names as the host of these sites, which are infringing on our copyright. www.sniohotel.forumfree.net http://habboultimate.forumfree.net/ http://retrohabbo.forumfree.net/ http://melo92.forumfree.net/?t=15870878&view=getlastpost www.habbokaos.forumfree.net www.habbissimo.forumfree.net www.habbaos.forumfree.net www.habboitalo.forumfree.net I hereby confirm that I am authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright for http://www.habbohotel.it. The owner of this copyright is Sulake IT Ltd. www.habbohotel.it is an online graphical chat and gaming environment for teenagers. The site takes the form of a virtual hotel, where each user is represented by an avatar called a Habbo. Habbos can walk, talk and dance in all of the hotel's public and private rooms. Private rooms are created by the Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo Credits. Users purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment methods, such as credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone lines and cheques. Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus: 'All rights including trademarks, copyright and database rights in this website and its contents are owned by or licensed to Sulake IT Ltd. All rights are reserved.' I have a good faith belief that the use of our material on this website is not authorised by Sulake IT Ltd, the copyright owner, or the law. I hereby confirm that all of the above information is accurate and that I am authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. I state this under penalty of perjury. I am thus writing to you to request that this site is removed from your servers forthwith. Please inform me when this has been effected. Yours sincerely, Barbara Steinberg Community Safety Assistant Manager Sulake Corporation MIME element (text/html)
 
 
Dear Sir/Madam,

Whois and Network inquiries listed your names as the host of these sites, which are infringing on our copyright.
 
www.sniohotel.forumfree.net
http://habboultimate.forumfre e.net/
http://retrohabbo.forumfree.net/
http ://melo92.forumfree.net/?t=15870878&view=getlastpost  
www.habbokaos.forumfree.net
www.habbissimo.forumfree.net< /A>
www.habbaos.forumfree.net
www.habboitalo.forumfree.net< /A>

I hereby confirm that I am authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the
copyright for http://www.habbohotel.it. The owner of this copyright is
Sulake IT Ltd.

www.habbohotel.it is an online graphical chat and gaming environment for
teenagers. The site takes the form of a virtual hotel, where each user is
represented by an avatar called a Habbo. Habbos can walk, talk and dance in
all of the hotel's public and private rooms. Private rooms are created by
the Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo Credits. Users
purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment methods, such as
credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone lines and
cheques.

Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus:
'All rights including trademarks, copyright and database rights in this
website and its contents are owned by or licensed to Sulake IT Ltd. All
rights are reserved.'

I have a good faith belief that the use of our material on this
website is not authorised by Sulake IT Ltd, the copyright owner, or the
law.

I hereby confirm that all of the above information is accurate and that
I am authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. I state this
under penalty of perjury.

I am thus writing to you to request that this site is removed from
your servers forthwith. Please inform me when this has been effected.

Yours sincerely,

Barbara Steinberg
Community Safety Assistant Manager
Sulake Corporation

 MIME element (text/plain)
